channel.title: Posts on Jiaxin Zhuang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jiaxin Zhuang

item.description:
About Me

I am a graduate student at Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University. I am studying in Intelligence Science & System Lab , advised by Pro. Ruixuan Wang .

My research interest lie within deep learning for computer vision, particalurly in imbalabed among data, clustering.

Selected Publication

  • Jiaxin Zhuang, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data. To appear in the 2nd International Conference on Medical Imaging with Deep Learning(MIDL), 2019, London, [openreview] [poster]

Awards & Honors

  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. 3rd place (out of 77 teams), MICCAI 2018 grand challenge “ISIC 2018: Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection”, Task 3 “Lesion Diagnosis”, 2018.
  • Ruoyu Lan, Wenbo Feng, Jiaxin Zhuang. Meritorious Winner, Mathematical Contest In Modeling, 2017
  • The Second Prize Scholarship, 2015
  • The Third Prize Scholarship, 2014

Teachering

  • TA for Deep learning, Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2019
